input.sentences: i spent all afternoon yesterday walking through the cemetery .
i read every headstone that i passed by .
some of them say some very sentimental things .
i came across a few that were actually meant to be funny .
most of them contained quotes and loving thoughts from family .
output.sentences: Yesterday I spent the day walking through an old cemetary.
I tried to read each headstone i passed.
Some of them made me quite sentimental.
Even though I'm sure none of them were meant to be funny, I still found some of them amusing.
My favorite headstones were the ones with loving family quotes.
